FuncDef:
The ds-lite log host command configures a DS-Lite log host.
The undo ds-lite log host command deletes DS-Lite log host configurations.
No DS-Lite log host is configured by default.
CLIs: ds-lite log host <host-ip-address> <host-port> source <source-ip-address> <source-port> name <host-name> [ vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] [ secondary ]
undo ds-lite log [ host <host-ip-address> [ <host-port> source <source-ip-address> <source-port> name <host-name> [ vpn-instance <vpn-instance-name> ] [ secondary ] ] ]

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the source IP address used by a DS-Lite device to communicate with a NAT log host.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the source port number used by a DS-Lite device to communicate with a DS-Lite log host.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 65535.

Specifies the name of a DS-Lite log host.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported.

Specifies the name of a VPN instance to which a DS-Lite log host belongs.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters, spaces not supported. In addition, the VPN instance name must not be _public_. When double quotation marks are used around the string, spaces are allowed in the string.

Indicates the secondary log host group.
-

Specifies IP address of a DS-Lite log host.
The value is in dotted decimal notation.

Specifies the port number of a DS-Lite log host.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 65535.

Examples: [*HUAWEI-ds-lite-instance-cpe1] ds-lite log host 192.168.100.10 1234 source 10.10.10.1 3456 name host1
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To configure a DS-Lite log host, run the DS-Lite log host command. After DS-Lite translates a source private IP address to a source public IP address, the source that initiates a request to access a network cannot be located, which decreases network security. To improve network security, the flow log function can be configured. DS-Lite logs record information about DS-Lite flows so that administrators can obtain addresses before DS-Lite translation is performed to query and trace network activities and operations. This improves network availability and security. The ds-lite log host command configures DS-Lite log host information, such as the log host's IP address, port number, log host name, and source IP address and port number that a device uses to communicate with a log host.
Prerequisites
The DS-Lite log function has been configured using the ds-lite log session enable command.
Precautions
A maximum of 64 log servers can be configured in a DS-Lite instance view.
